newsitem.title: USA: Union Auto acquires 9.99 pct of Meridian.
newsitem.headline: Union Auto acquires 9.99 pct of Meridian.

text.p: Union Automobile Insurance Co said Saturday that it has acquired a 9.99 percent interest in Indianapolis-based Meridian Insurance Group Inc.
Union Auto said that it has filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, and plans to file with the Indiana Department of Insurance, for increasing its holdings in Meridian to 15 percent.
